姎字的基本解释

姎
yāng
古代妇女自称。

姎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yāng］
［《廣韻》烏郎切，平唐，影。］
［《廣韻》烏朗切，上蕩，影。］
(1)女人自称。
(2)见“姎徒”。

姎字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　姎； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页258第25
【廣韻】【集韻】?於郞切，音鴦。【說文】女人自稱我也。　又【集韻】倚朗切，音坱。又於浪切，音盎。義?同。　又姎轉爲卬。【後漢·南蠻傳】名渠帥曰精夫，相呼爲姎徒。姎卬字別音通。

姎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
姎字的起名意思

古代妇女自称。

Shao
Basic explanation of words
Shao
yāng
Ancient women claimed to be.
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yāng］
["Guangyun" Wulangqie, Pingtang, Shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Wulangqi, the upper swing, the shadow. ]
(1) Women claim themselves.
(2) See "Shadow".
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　姎; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 258 to 25
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Tanqie, Yin Yang. [Said the text] Women claim to be me too.　[Jiyun] Relying on Langqie, sound 坱. Also cut in waves, sound Ang. Righteous? Same.　 and turned into 卬. [Later Han·Nanban Biography] The famous Qu Shuai was called a fine husband, and called each other as a servant. The word "姎卬" do not sound.
Shao
